Please excuse this brief announcement.

Tomorrow July 13th, 2005 will be FREE AUCTION DAY at NihontoAuctions.com. For one day you will be able to place as many free auctions as required withno further costs to the buyer or seller. NihontoAuctions.com is community supported, and safe.

Thank you,
Deron Douglas

http://www.NihontoAuctions.com
